Ballot module¶

class Ballot.Ballot(text: str)¶

Bases: object

__init__(text: str) → NoReturn¶

Constructor for Ballot class

Processes and parses text in order to extract the relevant information and store it in a Doubly-Linked List. Additionally initializes attributes and determines if vote is blank or invalid

Parameters

text (str) – Line of the ballots.csv from which votes and ballot number will be extracted

eliminate(candidate: int) → NoReturn¶

Eliminates specific candidate from ballot

First elimintes the candidate and then increases lower candidate’s ranks. This way the next iterations will have the most up to date data

Parameters

candidate (int) – Id of the candidate that will be eliminated

getBallotNum() → int¶

Return ballot number

Returns

Ballot number (which serves as an id)

Return type

number(int)

getCandidateByRank(rank: int) → int¶

Return the candidate that has the specified rank

Parameters

rank (int) – Specific rank we want to look fro

Returns

Candidate that has this rank

Return type

candidate(int)

getRankByCandidate(candidate: int) → int¶

Return the rank of the specified candidate

Parameters

candidate (int) – Id number of the candidate whose rank we want to check

Returns

The corresponding candidate’s rank

Return type

rank(int)

isBlank() → bool¶

Getter method for blank attribute

Returns

If this ballot is blank or not

Return type

blank(bool)

isInvalid() → bool¶

Getter method for invalid attribute

Returns

If this ballot is valid or not

Return type
